text: Fireball Ministry is the fourth studio album by Fireball Ministry. The album was released on March 16, 2010. ==Track listing== # "Hard Lines" – 4:14 # "Fallen Believers" – 4:37 # "Thought It Out" – 3:17 # "Followed by the Fall" – 3:54 # "Kick Back" – 3:41 # "Butcher, Faker, Policy Maker" – 4:44 # "End of Story" – 4:14 # "Common Enemy" – 4:13 # "Sleeping Angels" – 4:14 # "In Their Own Right" – 3:25 ==References== Category:2010 albums
title: Fireball Ministry (album)
